page.title: 07HURSTON CLOSE-FINDON VALLEY
page.content: A large property in Links Road epitomises the types of change prevailing in Findon Valley. Occupying a site of over 1 ha. in 1930,the one owner family built a house in the grounds in 1960,subdividing the garden. Now elderly,the original 1930 owners sold in 1985 a 0.2 ha.plot,fronting onto Hurston Close,to builder Mr. Robert Huckerby.On this site he has built 4 executive houses,two of which are linked,and two detatched. In order to conserve energy,these houses have been constructed using pumice blocks as the inner walls, 100mm fibreglass quilting and 125mm thermal blocks.
